name: Vgolden 4
description:
You wake in in some sort of lab, and realize you have to phase into computers to unlock areas of it. Find out what in the world is going on!

Platformer sections: WSD to move Space to jump, L and R arrow keys to dash

RPG Sections: WASD to move, Space to interact

WHEN LOADED, CLICK THE FLAG 3 TIMES!

--

Play the game on the Scratch here! Maybe leave a like on it there too so more people see it, it took a while to make.

--

Quick recap of the previous game: Gold was walking through an autumn forest when he came across a bot. They fought, but he won. After that, he went to a broken city road, fell into an abandoned lab, and got teleported through a huge portal.

--

This is my first itch.io page, if it's a bit messy, that's why.
